how.description: Set up your subscription service in just three easy steps.

first.title: Sign Up

second.title: Integrate Stripe
second.description: Connect Stripe for seamless billing and manage monthly or annual subscriptions.

third.title: Manage Subscriptions
third.description: Easily conetor and manage your subscriptions, with real-time updates.

features.description: Everything you need to build powerful Micro-SaaS applications.

oauth.description: Seamlessly integrate with Google, Facebook, and Twitter to provide a smooth login experience.

subscription.title: Subscription Management

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Crafted with TailwindCSS for a seamless experience across all devices.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Hear directly from our satisfied customers.

list.1: Sassy has been a game-changer for our Micro-SaaS project. The integration with Stripe and Supabase is seamless, and it helped us get started so much faster!
list.2: I was looking for a simple and reliable way to manage subscriptions for my SaaS product. Sassy’s Stripe integration is fantastic and easy to use!
list.3: The built-in authentication with Supabase and the payment gateway via Stripe saved us hours of development time. Highly recommend it!
list.4: As a solo developer, I needed a solid foundation for my Micro-SaaS. Sassy provided that and more! The flexibility of the template is incredible.
list.5: Sassy’s responsive design and clean architecture made it easy to deploy. I’ve been able to focus on building features rather than handling the basics.
list.6: The ease of integrating OAuth authentication with Google and Facebook made the user login process a breeze. This platform is a must-have for any developer.
list.7: With the subscription management system already in place, I could concentrate on my product’s core features. Sassy has been a huge time-saver.
list.8: Stripe webhooks and subscription handling worked flawlessly with my project. I’m really impressed with how well everything is integrated.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to help you understand how to leverage this template to kickstart your Micro-SaaS development.

1.question: What is this template for?
1.answer: This is a powerful template designed to accelerate the development of Micro-SaaS applications. It provides an example setup for subscription management, but you can easily adapt it to suit any SaaS product.

2.question: How do I get started with the template?
2.answer: Start by cloning the repository, setting up your environment with Next.js 15, and configuring TypeScript. The template is ready for development with integrations like Stripe and Supabase to manage your user data and payments.

3.question: Is this template focused on subscriptions?
3.answer: Subscriptions are just one example of functionality provided in this template. You can customize it to fit your Micro-SaaS application's needs, whether it's for billing, authentication, or any other aspect of your service.

4.question: What payment options are included?
4.answer: The template comes with an example of monthly and annual subscription management using Stripe. You can modify the payment flow to fit your app’s business model.

5.question: Can I integrate other services into this template?
5.answer: Yes, the template is built to be flexible. It supports integrations with Supabase for user management, Stripe for payments, and OAuth for authentication with services like Google, Facebook, and Twitter.

6.question: Is this template production-ready?
6.answer: While this template provides a solid foundation, it’s intended for development and customization. You'll need to tweak it to fit your production environment and business requirements.

7.question: How do I customize the template?
7.answer: You can easily modify the code to fit your specific use case. The architecture is modular, with separate components for authentication, payments, and user management, allowing for easy customization.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Welcome to our service. By using our website, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.description: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.description: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and usage data to improve our service and provide a better user experience.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the safety of your personal data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

changes.title: Changes to this Policy
changes.description: We may update this Terms and Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms or our privacy policy, feel free to contact us.
